reviewText: I think you are better off buying the VHS and having it professionally copied.  this is a great concert and I never tire of watching it.  Someone should copy the VHS with better equipment than was used for this DVD
I love it no one sing as great as the late Sammy Davis JR and Frank Sinatra and makes you laugh.

I have been looking for this concert. But, although the cover is good, the DVD is very blurred. I ordered the VHS copy that had good reviews and now having a professional copy that to DVD for me. Not widescreen like this one but a much better and clean version to watch.

One of the last recordings of Sinatra & Davis together Live, with Liza.  She took over for ailing Dean Martin.  I missed Dean.  But the three of them put on one memorable and fantastic performances.  A great Joy.  Buy it if you are Rat Pack fan.  Glad we have video and sound to keep this forever. I'll take it with me to heaven.  DJV of Madison, WI  www.amazon.com

I purchased this DVD from Amazon and when I received it, I decided to watch it with my brother over martinis. The DVD really is a great memento to a trio of amazing talents. Sammy Davis Jr, Liza Minnelli are at their peaks here and the performances are flawless and entertaining all the way around. Frank Sinatra makes his performance look easy and he is so comfortable on that stage.

All three are outstanding, amazing and hilarious. The comradary between these performers is incredible. They truly appreciate each other and play off that during the show.

The only flaw with the DVD would be the transfer. The sound and picture a little muffled. It's not terrible, but you felt that they could've done a better job. Other than that, it is highly recommended.
